title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and manage local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat back-end in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now “Open WebUI”): chat, multi-model, RAG, user management, plugins.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: run local LLMs as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Conversational TUI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-compatible server for VS Code and JetBrains IDEs.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama: Kotlin & Java builders, reactive streams, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb (ollama/ollama-rb)
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple DSL to chat, generate, and pull models.

title: ollama-litellm (BerriAI/litellm)
summary: LiteLLM lets you call Ollama, OpenAI, Anthropic with the same interface; includes proxy & budget tracking.

title: ollama-helm (james-minton/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, ingress, and PVC.

title: ollama-gpt-cli (sashabaranov/ollama-gpt-cli)
summary: Minimal Go CLI that wraps Ollama with GPT-style flags and conversation context.

title: ollama-nix (ollama/ollama-nix)
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells with CUDA/rocm support.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama/ollama-csharp)
summary: Official C#/.NET SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops with async enumerables.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama + sentence-transformers + FAISS to chat with local docs.

title: ollama-discord-bot (cirospaciari/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; slash commands & streaming replies.

title: ollama-dagger (dagger/dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust (ollama/ollama-rust)
summary: Community Rust crate: ergonomic async client for Ollama with Tokio and serde.

title: ollama-vscode (nicolasiscoding/ollama-vscode)
summary: VS Code extension to chat with Ollama models inside the editor sidebar; supports streaming and code blocks.
